title: Market Entry Strategy - European Expansion
description: Technology company evaluating options for entering European markets

options.name: Direct Sales Expansion
options.description: Hire local sales teams and establish offices in key European cities

options.name: Partner Channel Strategy
options.description: Work with established local partners and resellers

options.name: Remote-First Approach
options.description: Serve European customers remotely with targeted digital marketing

expectedOutput.reasoning: Balances speed to market with manageable risk and investment
